SQL.LOAD: SELECT schedule_id, day_of_week_id, from_time, to_time, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, schedule_detail_id FROM elp_schedule_detail WHERE schedule_detail_id = :schedule_detail_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select sd.SCHEDULE_DETAIL_ID, sd.SCHEDULE_ID, sd.DAY_OF_WEEK_ID, sd.FROM_TIME, sd.TO_TIME, s.CODE, s.DESCRIPTION, sd.created_by, sd.modified_by, sd.created_date, sd.modified_date From elp_schedule_detail sd join elp_schedule s on sd.schedule_id = sd.schedule_id join elp_service_schedule ss on ss.schedule_id = s.schedule_id where sd.schedule_id = :schedule_id and ss.service_schedule_id = :service_schedule_id
SQL.LOAD_SCHEDULE_DETAIL: SELECT schedule_detail_id, schedule_id, day_of_week_id, from_time, to_time, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, schedule_detail_id FROM elp_schedule_detail WHERE schedule_id = :schedule_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_schedule_detail SET schedule_id = :schedule_id, day_of_week_id = :day_of_week_id, from_time = :from_time, to_time = :to_time, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE schedule_detail_id = :schedule_detail_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_schedule_detail ( schedule_id, day_of_week_id, from_time, to_time, created_by, schedule_detail_id ) VALUES ( :schedule_id, :day_of_week_id, :from_time, :to_time, :created_by, :schedule_detail_id )
